moves.name: Leaf Storm
moves.description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Bestow
moves.description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.

moves.name: Natural Gift
moves.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Gust
moves.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Growth
moves.description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Stomp
moves.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: The target is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack will not miss.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Synthesis
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Leaf Tornado
moves.description: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Bestow
moves.description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

moves.name: Natural Gift
moves.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

moves.name: Leaf Storm
moves.description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.
